result.title: Competitive programming (mini)group
result.content:
Hello I saw the post from KrK about formation of group for codeforces user with rating >=2000. I suggest that we should also create a different group for users with rating <2000.

Motto

1.Share our doubts with people

2.Suggest new/interesting problem/algo

3.Discuss latest contest

Discussions will not be only about codeforces but various other online judges as well. This will help us to share and increase our coding knowledge

If you all support than we can create a new group on facebook so that all of us can join.
